ValidationRule.description: Coupon Account must be same as order Account
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( ISNULL( coupon__r.account__c ) ), NOT( order__r.Account__c = coupon__r.account__c), coupon__r.Name__c <> "TADROADSHOWGC17")
